column5: Our home is located in Austin, Texas. In the beautiful hills just southwest of downtown. Surrounded by greenbelt, you feel like you are out in the woods, even though the vibrant night life of downtown Austin is only a few minutes away (7 miles to 6th Street and 5 miles to Zilker Park, home of ACL and SWSX). This home is perfect for large groups and families.  Recent upgrades to our home include: Baby Grand Piano in the formal dining area. High Speed Internet (Fiber)
column8: Spacious and Comfortable Retreat - Near Downtown
